Npc0301:
ï¿½I always feel much better after hearing my mom's voice over the phone.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I was really homesick recently, and my mom cheered me right up.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You should call your mom sometime.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Believe me, those melancholy feelings will be gone before you know it.[HALT][END]
